participant_1.background:
I do yoga and write in my journal to stay healthy.
I would brag about my unique life story and how I managed to find success despite all the challenges I've faced.
i think i m fabulous.
I'm always ready to defend myself, but I'm also a big fan of comedy.
we live in a rural area.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a source of endless inspiration for my writing.
I have a house with a home gym so my kids can visit me when they want.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.

content.text: Hello!
Hello there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How about you?
I am doing well too, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What are you up to today?
I am just hanging out at home, writing and playing with my pets.
That sounds like a nice way to spend the day. I love to write too.
Me too! What kind of writing do you do?
I write mostly poetry and short stories.
Oh, that's awesome! I love reading both of those genres.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that.
So, what are some of your favorite writing prompts?
I love writing about nature and the human condition.
Those are both great topics! I love writing about travel and my family.
That's great! I love reading about both of those things too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
I think so too!
Do you want to exchange contact information so we can keep in touch?
Sure, that sounds great!
Great! I'll message you my number
